h1_38: Zucker School of Medicine at Hofstra/Northwell at Mather Hospital Program
h3_39: Zucker School of Medicine at Hofstra/Northwell
span_48: Zucker School of Medicine at Hofstra/Northwell at Mather Hospital Program
p_64: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).
h3_68: # of Filled Resident Positions, by Year*

th_99: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_102: Community hospital setting with family atmosphere. The transitional year at Mather is guaranteed for those who match into the diagnostic radiology position as long as it is properly linked with the transitional year-TY/rad-Mather Additionally, we also have an ESIR track for our residents who are interested in interventional Radiology. Being part of the Northwell network with a family atmosphere providing access to imaging cases throughout a large network
